00053 int tonatiuh_script::init( QScriptEngine* engine )
00054 {
00055         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00056         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00057         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00058 
00059         rayTracer->Clear();
00060 
00061         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_exportAll = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_exportAll );
00062         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_exportAll", fun_tonatiuh_exportAll );
00063 
00064         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_export = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_export );
00065         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_export", fun_tonatiuh_export );
00066 
00067         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_filename = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_filename );
00068         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_filename", fun_tonatiuh_filename );
00069 
00070         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_irradiance = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_irradiance );
00071         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_irradiance", fun_tonatiuh_irradiance );
00072 
00073         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_numrays = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_numrays );
00074         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_numrays", fun_tonatiuh_numrays );
00075 
00076         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_numdivisions = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_numdivisions );
00077         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_numdivisions", fun_tonatiuh_numdivisions );
00078 
00079         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_photon_map = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_photon_map );
00080         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_photon_map", fun_tonatiuh_photon_map );
00081 
00082         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_random_generator = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_random_generator );
00083         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_random_generator", fun_tonatiuh_random_generator );
00084 
00085         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_sunposition = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_sunposition );
00086         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_sunposition", fun_tonatiuh_sunposition );
00087 
00088         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_calculatesun = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_calculatesun );
00089         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_calculatesun", fun_tonatiuh_calculatesun );
00090 
00091         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene );
00092         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene", fun_tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene );
00093 
00094         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers );
00095         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers", fun_tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers );
00096 
00097         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_saveas = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_saveas );
00098         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_saveas", fun_tonatiuh_saveas );
00099 
00100         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_trace = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_trace );
00101         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_trace", fun_tonatiuh_trace );
00102 
00103         return 1;
00104 }
00105 
00106 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_exportAll(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00107 {
00108         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: takes exactly one argument." );
00109         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: argument is not a string." );
00110 
00111         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00112         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00113 
00114         QString fileName = context->argument(0).toString();
00115         if( fileName.isEmpty()  )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_exportAll: the export fileName is empty." );
00116 
00117         QFileInfo file(  fileName );
00118         if( !file.isAbsolute() )
00119         {
00120                 QString dirName = rayTracer->GetDir();
00121                 QDir currentDir( dirName );
00122                 QFileInfo absolutefile( currentDir, fileName );
00123                 fileName = absolutefile.absoluteFilePath();
00124         }
00125 
00126         QFileInfo modelFile( fileName ) ;
00127         if( !( modelFile.absoluteDir().exists() ) )
00128         {
00129                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_exportAll: The %1 file can not be opened." ).arg( fileName );
00130                 return context->throwError( QScriptContext::UnknownError, message );
00131         }
00132 
00133         int result = rayTracer->SetExportAll( fileName );
00134         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_exportAll: Error." );
00135 
00136         return 1;
00137 }
00138 
00139 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_export(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00140 {
00141         if( context->argumentCount() < 2 )      return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: takes at least two argument." );
00142         if( context->argumentCount() > 3 )      return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: takes at most three argument." );
00143 
00144         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: argument 1 is not a string." );
00145         if( !context->argument( 1 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: argument 2 is not a string." );
00146         if( (context->argumentCount() == 3) && !context->argument( 2 ).isBool() )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export() argument 3 is not a boolean." );
00147 
00148         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00149         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00150 
00151         QString fileName = context->argument(0).toString();
00152         if( fileName.isEmpty()  )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: the export fileName is empty." );
00153 
00154         QFileInfo file(  fileName );
00155         if( !file.isAbsolute() )
00156         {
00157                 QString dirName = rayTracer->GetDir();
00158                 QDir currentDir( dirName );
00159                 QFileInfo absolutefile( currentDir, fileName );
00160                 fileName = absolutefile.absoluteFilePath();
00161         }
00162 
00163         QFileInfo modelFile( fileName ) ;
00164         if( !( modelFile.absoluteDir().exists() ) )
00165         {
00166                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_export: The %1 file can not be opened." ).arg( fileName );
00167                 return context->throwError( QScriptContext::UnknownError, message );
00168         }
00169 
00170         QString surfaceName = context->argument(1).toString();
00171         QStringList nodeNames =  surfaceName.split( "/",QString::SkipEmptyParts );
00172 
00173         if( nodeNames[0] != "SunNode" )
00174         {
00175                         surfaceName = QString( "//SunNode/" );
00176                         surfaceName.append( nodeNames.join( QString( "/" ) ) );
00177         };
00178 
00179         bool isValidSurface = rayTracer->IsValidSurface( surfaceName );
00180         if( !isValidSurface )
00181         {
00182                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_export: %1 is not a valid surface to export." ).arg( surfaceName );
00183                 context->throwError( message );
00184         }
00185 
00186         bool coordinates = true;
00187         if( context->argumentCount() == 3)      coordinates= context->argument(2).toBool();
00188 
00189         int result = rayTracer->SetExportSurface( fileName, surfaceName, coordinates );
00190         if( result == 0 ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: Error." );
00191         return 1;
00192 }

00194 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_filename(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00195 {
00196         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00197         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00198 
00199         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: takes exactly one argument." );
00200         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: argument is not a string.");
00201 
00202 
00203 
00204         QString fileName = context->argument(0).toString();
00205         if( fileName.isEmpty()  )       return  context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: the model file is not correct." );
00206 
00207         QFileInfo file(  fileName );
00208         if( !file.isAbsolute() )
00209         {
00210                 QString dirName = rayTracer->GetDir();
00211                 QDir currentDir( dirName );
00212                 QFileInfo absolutefile( currentDir, fileName );
00213                 fileName = absolutefile.absoluteFilePath();
00214 
00215         }
00216 
00217         QFileInfo modelFile( fileName ) ;
00218         if( !modelFile.exists() )
00219         {
00220                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_filename: The %1 file can not be opened." ).arg( fileName );
00221                 return context->throwError( QScriptContext::UnknownError, message );
00222         }
00223 
00224         int result = rayTracer->SetTonatiuhModelFile( fileName );
00225         if( result == 0 )
00226         {
00227                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_filename: The %1 file is not a valid file." ).arg( fileName );
00228                 return context->throwError( message );
00229         }
00230 
00231         return 1;
00232 }

00234 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_irradiance(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00235 {
00236         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00237         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00238 
00239 
00240         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_irradiance: takes exactly one argument." );
00241         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_irradiance: argument is not a number." );
00242 
00243         double irradiance = context->argument(0).toNumber();
00244 
00245         int result = rayTracer->SetIrradiance( irradiance );
00246         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( QScriptContext::UnknownError, "tonatiuh_irradiance: UnknownError." );
00247 
00248         return 1;
00249 }

00251 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_numrays(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00252 {
00253         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00254         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00255 
00256         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numrays: takes exactly one argument." );
00257         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numrays: argument is not a number." );
00258 
00259         double nrays = context->argument(0).toNumber();
00260         if( nrays < 1 ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numrays: the number of rays must be at least 1." );
00261 
00262         int result = rayTracer->SetNumberOfRays( nrays );
00263         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numrays: UnknownError." );
00264 
00265         return 1;
00266 }

00268 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_numdivisions(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00269 {
00270         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00271         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00272 
00273         if( context->argumentCount() < 1 )      return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: takes at least one argument." );
00274         if( context->argumentCount() > 2 )      return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: takes no more than two arguments." );
00275         if(context->argumentCount()==2){
00276                 if( !context->argument( 1 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: second argument is not a number." );
00277 
00278                         double nheightdivisions = context->argument(1).toNumber();
00279                         if( nheightdivisions < 1 )      return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: the number of heigth divisions must be at least 1." );
00280 
00281                         int result = rayTracer->SetNumberOfHeightDivisions( nheightdivisions );
00282                         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: UnknownError." );
00283         }
00284         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: argument is not a number." );
00285 
00286         double nwidthdivisions = context->argument(0).toNumber();
00287         if( nwidthdivisions < 1 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: the number of width divisions must be at least 1." );
00288 
00289         int result = rayTracer->SetNumberOfWidthDivisions( nwidthdivisions );
00290         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numdivisions: UnknownError." );
00291 
00292         return 1;
00293 }

00295 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_photon_map(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00296 {
00297         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00298         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00299 
00300         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_photon_map: takes exactly one argument." );
00301         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_photon_map: argument is not a string." );
00302 
00303         QString photonMapType = context->argument(0).toString();
00304         if( !rayTracer->IsValidPhotonMapType( photonMapType ) ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_photon_map: defined photonMap type is not valid." );
00305 
00306         int result =    rayTracer->SetPhotonMapType( photonMapType );
00307         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_photon_map: UnknownError." );
00308 
00309         return 1;
00310 }

00312 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_random_generator(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00313 {
00314 
00315         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_random_generator: takes exactly one argument." );
00316         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_random_generator: argument is not a string." );
00317 
00318         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property( "rayTracer" );
00319         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00320         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00321 
00322         QString randomDeviateType = context->argument(0).toString();
00323         if( !rayTracer->IsValidRandomGeneratorType( randomDeviateType ) )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_random_generator: defined random generator type is not valid." );
00324         rayTracer->SetRandomDeviateType( randomDeviateType );
00325 
00326         int result =    rayTracer->SetRandomDeviateType( randomDeviateType );
00327         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_random_generator: UnknownError." );
00328 
00329         return 1;
00330 }

00332 QScriptValue  tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_sunposition(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00333 {
00334         //tonatiuh_sunposition( azimuth, elevation, distance );
00335         if( ( context->argumentCount() < 2 ) || ( context->argumentCount() > 3 ) )
00336                 return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: takes 2 argument." );
00337         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: argument 1 is not a number." );
00338         if( !context->argument( 1 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: argument 2 is not a number." );
00339 
00340         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00341         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00342         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00343 
00344         double azimuth = context->argument(0).toNumber();
00345         if( ( azimuth < 0. ) || ( azimuth > 360. ) )    return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: azimuth value must be between 0 and 360 degrees." );
00346         rayTracer->SetSunAzimtuh( azimuth );
00347 
00348         double elevation = context->argument(1).toNumber();
00349         if( ( elevation < 0. ) || ( elevation > 90. ) ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: elevation value must be between 0 and 90 degrees." );
00350         rayTracer->SetSunElevation( elevation );
00351 
00352         return 1;
00353 
00354 }
00355 
00356 QScriptValue  tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_calculatesun(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00357 {
00358         //tonatiuh_sunposition( azimuth, elevation, distance );
00359         if( ( context->argumentCount()!=6))
00360                 return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_calculatesun: must take 5 arguments." );
00361         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_calculatesun: argument 1 is not a number." );
00362         if( !context->argument( 1 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_calculatesun: argument 2 is not a number." );
00363         if( !context->argument( 2 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_calculatesun: argument 3 is not a number." );
00364         if( !context->argument( 3 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_calculatesun: argument 4 is not a number." );
00365         if( !context->argument( 4 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_calculatesun: argument 5 is not a number." );
00366         if( !context->argument( 5 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_calculatesun: argument 6 is not a number." );
00367 
00368         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00369         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00370         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00371 
00372         int year = context->argument(0).toNumber();
00373         int month = context->argument(1).toNumber();
00374         int day = context->argument(2).toNumber();
00375         double hours = context->argument(3).toNumber();
00376         double latitude = context->argument(4).toNumber();
00377         double longitude = context->argument(5).toNumber();
00378         if( ( month < 0 ) || ( month> 12 ) ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_calculatesun: month must be between 1 and 12." );
00379         if( ( day < 0 ) || ( day > 31  ) ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_calculatesun: the day must be between 1 and 31." );
00380         if( ( hours < 0 ) || ( hours > 23  ) ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_calculatesun: the hour must be between 1 and 31." );
00381         if( ( longitude < -180. ) || ( longitude > 180.  ) ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_calculatesun: the longitude must be between -180 and 180." );
00382         if( ( latitude < -90. ) || ( latitude > 90.  ) ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_calculatesun: the latitude must be between -90 and 90." );
00383 
00384         cTime myTime = { year, month, day, hours, 0, 0 };
00385         cLocation myLocation = {longitude , latitude };
00386         cSunCoordinates results;
00387         sunpos( myTime, myLocation, &results );
00388 
00389         //if( ( results.dAzimuth < 0. ) || ( azimuth > 360. ) ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: azimuth value must be between 0 and 360 degrees." );
00390         rayTracer->SetSunAzimtuh( results.dAzimuth );
00391 
00392         //double elevation = context->argument(1).toNumber();
00393         //if( ( < 0. ) || ( elevation > 90. ) ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: elevation value must be between 0 and 90 degrees." );
00394         rayTracer->SetSunElevation(results.dZenithAngle );
00395 
00396         /*if(90-results.dZenithAngle<0){
00397                 return 2;
00398         }*/
00399         rayTracer->SetSunPositionToScene();
00400         if((90-results.dZenithAngle)<0)return false;
00401         else return true;
00402 
00403 }
00404 
00405 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00406 {
00407         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00408         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00409         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00410 
00411         if( context->argumentCount() )  context->throwError( "tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene() no takes arguments." );
00412 
00413         int result = rayTracer->SetSunPositionToScene();
00414         if( result == 0 )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene() error." );
00415 
00416         return 1;
00417 }

00419 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00420 {
00421         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00422         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00423         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00424 
00425         if( context->argumentCount()!=1 )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers() takes exactly one argument." );
00426         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isBool() )  context->throwError( "tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers: argument is not a bool.");
00427         int result = rayTracer->SetDisconnectAllTrackers(context->argument( 0 ).toBool());
00428         if( result == 0 )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers() error." );
00429 
00430         return 1;
00431 }

00433 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_saveas(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00434 {
00435         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00436         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00437         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00438 
00439         if( context->argumentCount()!=1 )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_saveas() takes exactly one argument." );
00440         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        context->throwError( "tonatiuh_saveas: argument is not a string.");
00441 
00442         QString fileName = context->argument(0).toString();
00443         if( fileName.isEmpty()  )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_saveas: the model file is not correct." );
00444 
00445         QFileInfo file(  fileName );
00446         if( !file.isAbsolute() )
00447         {
00448                 QString dirName = rayTracer->GetDir();
00449                 QDir currentDir( dirName );
00450                 QFileInfo absolutefile( currentDir, fileName );
00451                 fileName = absolutefile.absoluteFilePath();
00452         }
00453 
00454 
00455         int result = rayTracer->Save(fileName);
00456         if( result == 0 )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_saveas() error." );
00457 
00458         return 1;
00459 }
00460 
00461 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_trace(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00462 {
00463         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00464         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00465         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00466 
00467         if( context->argumentCount() )  return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_trace() no takes arguments." );
00468 
00469         int result = rayTracer->Trace();
00470         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_trace() error." );
00471 
00472         return 1;
00473 }
